About Me

A little bit of information about Kwabena

BIO

I am a Development Planner with over 12 years' experience in sustainable development and currently works with AngloGold Ashanti. Before joining AngloGold in March 2019, I successfully led projects in Ethical Cocoa Production and Traceability Schemes.

I have a Degree in Sociology and Political Science from the University of Ghana and a Masters Degree in Development Planning and Management from Kwame Nkrumah University of Science. Additionally, I possess a post graduate certicate in Results-Based Project Management from the University of Witswatersrand and a Certificate in Theory of Change for Development from the same institution. I am a fond student of Information Technology and has deep experience with Elevate DBMS and Web Development. He has a certicate from Microsoft Corporation in Front-End Web Development.
